byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal contributed reporting from Ramallah, West Bank.

abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, addressing wave of violence in West Bank, announces establishment of bypass roads for Israeli drivers and revocation of work permits for extended families of Palestinian attackers.
lead_paragraph: The prime minister said Israeli drivers would be able to bypass certain intersections in the occupied West Bank, where an Israeli soldier was killed in the latest spate of attacks by Palestinians.

headline.main: Benjamin Netanyahu Plans Separate Bypass Roads for Israelis in Parts of West Bank
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Announces New Steps in West Bank

snippet: The prime minister said Israeli drivers would be able to bypass certain intersections in the occupied West Bank, where an Israeli soldier was killed in the latest spate of attacks by Palestinians.
